text: Dharamshala is a city in northern India. It is the winter seat of government of the state of Himachal Pradesh and the district headquarters of the Kangra district. McLeod Ganj, a village within Dharamshala municipality, is the home of the Dalai Lama and the exiled Tibetan government. It is a popular place for Indian and foreign tourists, including students studying Tibet. == Photo gallery == Dharamsala-Kora-18-gje.jpg Dharamsala-Kora-08-Moench rettet Wurm-gje.jpg Dharamsala-Karma Yangdup-02-gje.jpg Dharamsala-Frauenkloster Dolma Ling-08-gje.jpg Dharamsala-Norbulingka-22-Gompa-gje.jpg Dharamsala- Kinderdorf-02-Spielplatz-Schule-gje.jpg Dharamsala-Kinderdorf-22-Maedchen- gje.jpg Dharamsala-Tse Chok Ling-04-Lage-gje.jpg Dharamsala-Tse Chok Ling-60-Laienwohntrakt-gje.jpg Category:Tibetan Buddhism Category:Cities in India Category:Himachal Pradesh
title: Dharamshala
